title: Ocean Zones by Depth
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Ocean Zones by Depth.

hook.text: The ocean has layers. Each one is a different world with different rules.

buildup.text: The sunlit zone extends to 200 m. Most ocean life lives here, where light reaches.
